partial_orders.reason: Both edits perform identical structural modifications to different ColorControl command calls within the same class. Each edit adds the exact same parameters (optionsMask=1, optionsOverride=1) with identical comments to similar command structures. This represents a bulk-edit pattern where the same before→after substitution is being applied to the same type of syntactic construct (ColorControl command parameter lists). Both edits are part of a single, contiguous refactor to enable color setting while lights are off across multiple color control methods.
